| HistoryText             = [[Hardcore (Earth-616)|Hardcore]] created the team the Untouchables. He sent [[Robert Hunter (Earth-616)|Nitro]], [[Richard Yurocko (Earth-616)|Kickback]] and [[Lonnie Lincoln (Earth-616)|Tombstone]] to fight [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]] and capture [[Dakota North (Earth-616)|Dakota North]].{{r|Cage #2}}{{r|Cage #3}} However, Kickback chose this time to attempt a rebellion, which proved unsuccessful. Hardcore blew up the [[Black Hole]] in [[Colorado (State)|Colorado]] after almost killing Cage.{{r|Cage #4}}
